_comment: Medium configuration with uniform crossover and block mutation
_comment_profile: Balanced execution with structured exploration - uniform crossover provides thorough mixing while block mutation explores correlated feature groups

_comment_crossover_descriptions.uniform: Uniform crossover - each gene swapped independently with swap_probability

_comment_mutation_descriptions.block: Contiguous block of bits flipped together (size controlled by block_size)

_comment_parameters.uniform_swap_prob: Used with uniform crossover - probability of swapping each gene (set to 0.4 for medium exploration)
_comment_parameters.arithmetic_alpha: Used with arithmetic crossover - weight factor (0 < alpha < 1)
_comment_parameters.block_size: Used with block mutation - size of contiguous block to mutate (increased to 4 for medium-scale changes)
_comment_parameters.adaptive_min_prob: Used with adaptive mutation - minimum mutation probability
_comment_parameters.adaptive_max_prob: Used with adaptive mutation - maximum mutation probability

_comment_performance_notes.population_size: Medium population for balanced exploration vs computation time
_comment_performance_notes.generations: Moderate generations allowing thorough search without excessive runtime
_comment_performance_notes.crossover_prob: High crossover probability to leverage uniform mixing
_comment_performance_notes.mutation_prob: Conservative base mutation rate balanced with larger block size
_comment_performance_notes.block_exploration: Block size of 4 allows exploration of feature group dependencies
